changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.createView: select distinct on (units) (units) as name, (case when length(regexp_replace(units, E'[^a-zA-Z0-9]','','g')) > 37 then 'MU_'||upper(substring(regexp_replace(units, E'[^a-zA-Z0-9]','','g'),0,38)) else 'MU_'||upper(regexp_replace(units, E'[^a-zA-Z0-9]','','g')) end) as temp_oid from item where length(units) >0

changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.sql: insert into measurement_unit (oc_oid, name) select distinct on (v.temp_oid) v.temp_oid, v.name from view_item_unit v where not exists (select mu.* from measurement_unit mu where mu.name = v.name or mu.oc_oid = v.temp_oid)

changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.sql: insert into measurement_unit (oc_oid, name) select case when v.temp_oid = 'MU_' then v.temp_oid || round (random()*100000000) when length(v.temp_oid) > 32 then substring(v.temp_oid,0,33)||'_'||round(random()*10000000) else v.temp_oid||'_'||round(random()*10000000) end, v.name from view_item_unit v where not exists (select mu.* from measurement_unit mu where mu.name = v.name) and v.temp_oid in (select mu.oc_oid from measurement_unit mu where mu.oc_oid = v.temp_oid and mu.name != v.name)

changeSet.author: ywang
changeSet.sql: update measurement_unit set oc_oid = 'MU_'||round(random()*10000000) where measurement_unit.oc_oid = 'MU_'
